name: Mannov
goal:
We communicate to drive change

Ever since Mannov’s foundation in 1975 we have focused on creating results. On our part, this has required genuine interest in our clients and their challenges, enthusiasm for driving change, and the strength to utilize the many new possibilities in order to reach our clients’ target groups.
